altername_name: Kunio-kun no Chou Nekketsu!: Soccer League Plus: World Hyper Cup Hen
name: River City Soccer Hooligans
overview: Challenge the world's best soccer teams! Select your matches from 12 opposing teams from around the world. As Captain Kunio, you can strategize by changing your formations, checking weather forecasts, talking to your teammates, and giving them special items to boost their performance!
